stories.title: Galaxy's Legacy Lives On
stories.intended_reader: Cruise enthusiasts interested in fleet history
stories.markdown:
**If Century proved the concept, Galaxy perfected it.**

[Celebrity Galaxy](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-galaxy.html) launched in 1996 as Century Class's second ship. She took Century's innovations and refined them. The lessons from a year of operations informed every enhancement.

The Orion Restaurant built on Grand Restaurant's success. The spa expanded what Century introduced. Galaxy wasn't just sister shipâ€”she was improved sister ship.

For two decades, Galaxy represented Celebrity excellence. The Alaska sailings that became legendary. The Mediterranean voyages attracting repeat passengers. The ship that proved Century Class could sustain.

**The truth:** Galaxy refined Century's revolution. Her departure from the fleet removed a ship that proved the concept could endure.

Those who sailed Galaxy remember her as Century's accomplished sibling. The ship that took innovation and made it sustainable.

stories.title: Galaxy's Alaska Excellence
stories.intended_reader: Former passengers remembering Galaxy's Alaska sailings
stories.core_insight: Galaxy's Alaska deployments created legendary voyages
stories.markdown:
**Galaxy's Alaska sailings became the standard others measured against.**

[Celebrity Galaxy](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-galaxy.html) worked Alaska waters with particular excellence. The intimate Century Class size fit fjords and glaciers. The service standards matched wilderness majesty.

Hubbard Glacier from Galaxy's deck. Tracy Arm exploration with Galaxy's knowledgeable crew. Premium ship meeting premium destination.

'Galaxy belongs in Alaska,' passengers would say.

'Alaska belongs to Galaxy,' the loyal would counter.

**The truth:** Galaxy's Alaska deployments proved Century Class suited wilderness. Her departure left Alaska without this particular excellence.

Those who sailed Galaxy through Alaska remember the combination. The ship that matched the destination.

stories.title: Farewell to Galaxy
stories.core_insight: Galaxy's transition to TUI marked an era's end
stories.markdown:
**Galaxy's final Celebrity voyage closed a chapter that hurt to end.**

[Celebrity Galaxy](/ships/celebrity-cruises/celebrity-galaxy.html) left Celebrity to become Mein Schiff 3 for TUI Cruises. The ship that had defined premium for nearly two decades sailed under a new flag.

Those final voyages drew the loyal. Passengers who'd sailed Galaxy for years. The goodbye that ships shouldn't require but do.

'She'll still be sailing,' one passenger observed at the farewell dinner.

'But not for us,' another replied.

**The truth:** Galaxy's departure removed a ship that had become family to many. She sails on, but under different identity. The Celebrity Galaxy we knew exists only in memory now.

Those who loved Galaxy remember the goodbye. The transition from our ship to their ship.
